item.title: HSC Seminar
item.description: Fall 2023 10/4/23 - Data-centric Architecture Support for Security, Yuanchao Xu (UCSC) 10/18/23 - Challenges and Opportunities to Accelerate ML Inference with Sparsity, Zhibin Xiao (Moffett.AI) 11/1/23 - Reflections on Trusting TrustHUB, Christian Krieg (TU Wien) 11/15/23 - Opportunities and Challenges for In- and Near-Memory Computing for Machine Intelligence, Siddharth Joshi (Notre Dame), @s14joshi Spring 2023 4/12/23 - Scaling up Server Performance via In-Memory Processing, José Martínez (Cornell) 4/19/23 - Beyond Static Parallel Loops: Supporting Dynamic Task Parallelism on Manycore Architectures with Software-Managed Scratchpad Memories, Max Ruttenberg (Washington)

Eshraghian, Bingo Wing-Kuen Ling, Ciyan Zheng, Xiao-Li Wang, A deep learning approach to cardiovascular disease classification using empirical mode decomposition for ECG feature extraction. Biomed.
